articles.title: Cameroon launches world’s first national malaria vaccine programme for children - ZAWYA
articles.description: The Central African nation targets vaccinating 250,000 children in the next two years
articles.content: Cameroon has become the first nation to officially roll out a national malaria vaccination programme for children, marking a significant step in the fight against the mosquito-borne disease. The init… [+2719 chars]

articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: Cameroon Launches First Malaria Vaccine Program for Children - VOA Learning English
articles.description: Cameroon has begun the world’s first major malaria vaccine program for children. Health officials called the effort a major step in the fight against the disease. Africa accounts for about 95 percent of the world’s malaria deaths.
articles.content:
Cameroon has begun the worlds first major malaria vaccine program for children.
